name: Backpacker 3: Mediterraneo
summary: Bckpacker 3 – Mediterraneo is an add-on for those of you who have Backpacker 3 installed on your computer, and which you can play with your friends in front of the computer or online over the Internet. The game takes you around the entire Mediterranean, from the Riviera to the Nile Delta. You finance your trip by taking the jobs offered: squid cleaner on a Greek fishing boat or jury member at a film festival are some of the options. Part of the game is the raffle travel adventure Pandora's box. You must solve the mysterious disappearance of a young archaeologist. The mission takes place in the Mediterranean area but can take you to other countries and continents. The adventure is structured so that it can be played multiple times with different destinations, events and results.
